form_fields.label: DB Cache Size (In mb)
form_fields.hint: Set database cache size in megabytes; machines sync faster with a larger cache. Recommend setting as high as possible based upon machine's available RAM. Default 450 Mb.

form_fields.label: Max Mempool Size (In mb)
form_fields.hint: Keep the transaction memory pool below <n> megabytes. Default 300 Mb.

form_fields.label: Listen for Incoming Connections (0 disabled / 1 enabled)
form_fields.hint: Accept incoming connections from peers. Default disabled.

form_fields.label: Max Peer Connections
form_fields.hint: Maintain at most N connections to peers. Default 125.

form_fields.label: Enable RPC Server (0 disabled / 1 enabled)
form_fields.hint: Accept command line and JSON-RPC commands. Default disabled.

form_fields.label: RPC Auth
form_fields.hint: Username and hashed password for JSON-RPC connections. The field <userpw> comes in the format: <USERNAME>:<SALT>$<HASH>. RPC clients connect using rpcuser=<USERNAME>/rpcpassword=<PASSWORD> arguments. You can generate this value at https://jlopp.github.io/bitcoin-core-rpc-auth-generator/.

form_fields.label: RPC Allow IP Address
form_fields.hint: Allow JSON-RPC connections from specified source. Valid for <ip> are a single IP (e.g. 1.2.3.4), a network/netmask (e.g. 1.2.3.4/255.255.255.0) or a network/CIDR (e.g. 1.2.3.4/24).
